title: Logistics Route Calculator
vehicle_1_info: Pallet size: 1200x800 mm. Space in the vehicle: 160x100x120 cm. Suitable for small deliveries. Vehicle features: Loading is only possible from the rear. The vehicle has no ramp height. The vehicle does not have a lifting platform.
vehicle_2_info: Space in the vehicle: 3.84 m². The vehicle can carry 3.7x150x170 cm. Suitable for small deliveries. Vehicle features: Loading is only possible from the rear.
vehicle_3_info: Optimal for medium batches. The vehicle can carry 480x220x230 cm. Total area: 9.6 m². Vehicle features: Side and rear loading possible. The vehicle has no ramp height. The vehicle has an additional lifting platform and pallet jack.
vehicle_4_info: Ideal for large loads. Maximum vehicle space: 14.4 m² (610x245x250 cm) up to 2150 kg. Vehicle features: Side, rear, and top loading possible. The vehicle has ramp height. The vehicle has an additional lifting platform and pallet jack.
